trans-unit.source: Represents a scaled view of the chart.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en skalert visning av diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag that indicates whether the axis is zoomed in.
trans-unit.target: Henter et flagg som indikerer om zoomes inn aksen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the axis is zoomed in; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis aksen zoomes inn på; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den minste størrelsen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the minimum size of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> som representerer den minste størrelsen på skalaen visningen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir målenheten for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer målenheten for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir posisjonen for skalaen visningen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the position of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> som representerer posisjonen for skalaen visningen.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls to a position along an axis specified by the newPosition parameter, which is expressed as a value.
trans-unit.target: Ruller til en plassering langs en akse som er angitt av den newPosition parameteren som er angitt som en verdi.

trans-unit.source: The new position to scroll.
trans-unit.target: Den nye posisjonen å rulle.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls to a position along an axis specified by the newPosition parameter.
trans-unit.target: Ruller til en plassering langs en akse som er angitt av den newPosition parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The new position to scroll.
trans-unit.target: Den nye posisjonen å rulle.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls along an axis according to the direction and size indicated by the scrollType parameter.
trans-unit.target: Ruller langs en akse i henhold til retningen og størrelsen som er angitt av den scrollType parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The direction and size to scroll.
trans-unit.target: Retningen og størrelsen for å rulle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen på skalaen visningen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the size of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> som representerer størrelsen på skalaen visningen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir målenheten for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer målenheten for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum small scrolling size.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir lavt rullende minimumsstørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: Used only if the small scrolling size is not set.
trans-unit.target: Brukes bare hvis lavt rullende størrelsen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the small scrolling size.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> som representerer rullende liten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir målenheten for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer målenheten for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the small scrolling size.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen på lavt rullende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the small scrolling size.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som Representer rullende liten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir målenheten for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer målenheten for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum axis value of a data view.
trans-unit.target: Henter maksimumsverdien for en datavisning.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the maximum axis value for the data view.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> som representerer maksimumsverdien for datavisning.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum axis value of a data view.
trans-unit.target: Henter minimumsverdien for en datavisning.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the minimum axis value for the data view.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> som representerer minimumsverdien for datavisning.

trans-unit.source: Sets a new axis data view and/or position based on the specified start and end values.
trans-unit.target: Angir en ny aksedatavisning og/eller posisjon basert på de angitte verdiene for start- og sluttdato.

trans-unit.source: The new start position for the axis scale view.
trans-unit.target: Ny startposisjonen for aksen skalaen visningen.

trans-unit.source: The new end position for the axis scale view.
trans-unit.target: Ny Sluttposisjon for aksen skalaen visningen.

trans-unit.source: Sets a new axis data view and/or position based on the specified start position, view size and unit of measurement.
trans-unit.target: Angir en ny aksedatavisning og/eller posisjon basert på angitte startposisjonen, Vis størrelsen og målenhet.

trans-unit.source: The new start position for the axis scale view.
trans-unit.target: Ny startposisjonen for aksen skalaen visningen.

trans-unit.source: The new size for the axis scale view.
trans-unit.target: Den nye størrelsen for akse skalaen visningen.

trans-unit.source: The new unit of measurement of the size.
trans-unit.target: Den nye målenheten i størrelsen.

trans-unit.source: Sets a new axis data view and/or position based on the specified start position, view size, unit of measurement and save state.
trans-unit.target: Angir en ny aksedatavisning og/eller posisjon basert på den angitte plasseringen, vise størrelsen, målenheten og lagre tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The new start position for the axis scale view.
trans-unit.target: Ny startposisjonen for aksen skalaen visningen.

trans-unit.source: The new size for the axis scale view.
trans-unit.target: Den nye størrelsen for akse skalaen visningen.

trans-unit.source: The new unit of measurement of the size.
trans-unit.target: Den nye målenheten i størrelsen.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current size and/or position must be saved.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den gjeldende størrelse og/eller posisjon må lagres.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the zooming user interface is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som indikerer om zooming brukergrensesnittet er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zooming user interface is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis zooming brukergrensesnittet er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Resets one zoom operation by restoring the axis data view.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller én zoom operasjon ved å gjenopprette aksedatavisning.

trans-unit.source: Resets the specified number of zoom operations by restoring the axis data view.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller det angitte antallet zoomoperasjoner ved å gjenopprette aksedatavisning.

trans-unit.source: Set the `numberOfViews` parameter to zero (0) to reset all zoom operations.
trans-unit.target: Angi den `numberOfViews` parameteren til null (0) til å tilbakestille alle zoomoperasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Number of zoom operations to reset.
trans-unit.target: Antall zoomoperasjoner for å tilbakestille.
